author: indra-ehep
body:
#### PR description:

1. Checks added for detid validity. This has been found to spot the origin of the problem observed during DQM study. See related presentations at,
a) See "2022-10-10_HGCal_in_CMSSW.pdf" by Indranil at https://indico.cern.ch/event/1208397/
b) See Sunada's presentation at https://indico.cern.ch/event/1210093/

2. Added feature to run muon tomography for selected layers as provided in input instead of all layers. 
Expected command will be like,

cmsRun testHGCalCellHitSum_cfg.py layers=1,4,26,41

in case results need to be produced for layer number 1,4,26 and 41.

3. Added feature to mark the first three cell indices(added by Pruthvi). 
4. Now can read wafer input files corresponding to HGCAL geometry version v15, v16, v17. 
5. Added further documentation. 
6. Code cleaning.

Note that there will another PR related to this PR at "https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw-cfipython" with branch name "LayerList" 

https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw-cfipython/pull/1

to fully apply the features added in present commit.

#### PR validation:

runTheMatrix test is not applicable since it produces a separate tomography related output file.
Please perform standard test like coding convention and related tests.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Backport not required merging with 12-6-X is sufficient.

Before submitting your pull requests, make sure you followed this checklist:
- verify that the PR is really intended for the chosen branch
- verify that changes follow [CMS Naming, Coding, And Style Rules](http://cms-sw.github.io/cms_coding_rules.html)
- verify that the PR passes the basic test procedure suggested in the [CMSSW PR instructions](https://cms-sw.github.io/PRWorkflow.html)
